docs.snippet: WAR IN THE GULF A12-17    Allied troops neared Kuwait City, and armored columns and a huge fleet of helicopters stormed into Iraq, heading toward Basra. The forces advanced faster than expected, meeting only scattered resistance. Page A1...
docs.lead_paragraph: WAR IN THE GULF A12-17 Allied troops neared Kuwait City, and armored columns and a huge fleet of helicopters stormed into Iraq, heading toward Basra. The forces advanced faster than expected, meeting only scattered resistance. Page A1

docs.snippet: Earlier this month "Dances With Wolves" set the pace in Oscar nominations: it received a dozen. The film also leads others nominated in quantity of planned tape releases: two. On Aug. 29 Orion is scheduled to issue the standard three-hour version ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Earlier this month "Dances With Wolves" set the pace in Oscar nominations: it received a dozen. The film also leads others nominated in quantity of planned tape releases: two. On Aug. 29 Orion is scheduled to issue the standard three-hour version of the Kevin Costner movie, and around Christmas will come a two-cassette collectors' edition. The latter will contain, for those craving still more Sioux and big sky, 52 minutes of additional footage that wouldn't fit into the original story line, plus a 30-minute documentary on the making of the film. Video plans for a few other nominees in the best-picture, acting and directing categories are either announced or on hold. "Ghost" (Paramount; best picture, supporting actress) will be out on March 21. "The Grifters" (HBO; best actress and director) will be released June 5, and "Mr. and Mrs. Bridge" (also HBO; best actress) June 12. "The Field" (LIVE; best actor) is scheduled for August.

docs.snippet: "I know, I know," said Stanley, even before I could sit down. "You're wondering why I look so pale."   Stanley, one of the last of a dwindling breed of creative Hollywood producers, can read minds, which may be why he has more money than friends....
docs.lead_paragraph: "I know, I know," said Stanley, even before I could sit down. "You're wondering why I look so pale." Stanley, one of the last of a dwindling breed of creative Hollywood producers, can read minds, which may be why he has more money than friends.

docs.snippet: Remember Pliny the Elder? He's the fellow who advised, in a manner of speaking, "Ne supra crepidam sutor judicaret." Or, as most people say, "Let the cobbler stick to his last."    But does anybody listen? Judging by Jack Nicholson, Clint Eastwood...
docs.lead_paragraph: Remember Pliny the Elder? He's the fellow who advised, in a manner of speaking, "Ne supra crepidam sutor judicaret." Or, as most people say, "Let the cobbler stick to his last." But does anybody listen? Judging by Jack Nicholson, Clint Eastwood, Robert Redford and Woody Allen, the answer is: of course not. All are successful actors who turned to directing.

headline.main: Ready When You Are, J. N., C. E., R. R.

docs.snippet: A wedding is not a prom, a masquerade ball or a burlesque show ("The Wedding," Jan. 27). It is a celebration of two people making a serious commitment, and many times this takes place in a house of worship. The bride's choice of dress may be simpl...
docs.lead_paragraph: A wedding is not a prom, a masquerade ball or a burlesque show ("The Wedding," Jan. 27). It is a celebration of two people making a serious commitment, and many times this takes place in a house of worship. The bride's choice of dress may be simple or elaborate, but it should be in good taste and should command respect for her and the wedding. Women should not support styles like Oscar de la Renta's "tulle-shrouded mini-bubble," which turns the wedding celebration into an irreverent spectacle. EVELYN RYAN Chatham, N.J.

docs.snippet: "It's no accomplishment to have or raise kids," Woody Allen often used to say. "Any fool can do it."    Then in the fall of 1979 he met Mia Farrow, who had seven children. Mia, he now says, "introduced me to a whole other world. Yet the two of us ...
docs.lead_paragraph: "It's no accomplishment to have or raise kids," Woody Allen often used to say. "Any fool can do it." Then in the fall of 1979 he met Mia Farrow, who had seven children. Mia, he now says, "introduced me to a whole other world. Yet the two of us have so little in common that it always amazes us. We're always marveling on why we threw in our lot together and stayed together as long as we have.

headline.main: Woody and Mia: A New York Story

byline.original: By Eric Lax; Eric Lax is the author of "Woody Allen: A Biography," from which this article is adapted. The book will be published in May by Alfred A. Knopf

docs.snippet: The killing of Enrique Bermudez, the former contra rebel commander, could set off a new round of political violence in Nicaragua after a year of relative peace, United States and Nicaraguan officials say.    Mr. Bermudez's slaying in Managua on Sa...
docs.lead_paragraph: The killing of Enrique Bermudez, the former contra rebel commander, could set off a new round of political violence in Nicaragua after a year of relative peace, United States and Nicaraguan officials say. Mr. Bermudez's slaying in Managua on Saturday night has been condemned by the Government, by the Sandinista party and by former contras, but tensions are rising. As his body was loaded on an aircraft headed for Miami, where he is to be buried Wednesday, 1,000 former rebels broke through a cordon of riot police officers, shook their fists and chanted: "Eye for an eye! Tooth for a tooth!"

byline.original: By CLIFFORD KRAUSS, Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: The Government pledged a rapid investigation today of the slaying on Saturday night of a former leader of the contra rebels as the Sandinistas and the contras traded accusations about the killing.   Enrique Bermudez, the hard-line commander who le...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Government pledged a rapid investigation today of the slaying on Saturday night of a former leader of the contra rebels as the Sandinistas and the contras traded accusations about the killing. Enrique Bermudez, the hard-line commander who led an eight-year war against the former Sandinista Government, was shot twice in the head near his car in the parking lot of a hotel here, the police said. Security officials said they had no immediate clues to who was responsible.

headline.main: Quick Solution Is Sought in Ex-Contra Chief's Death
